LanguageData.Warg.label: warg
LanguageData.Warg.description: Criaturas muito musculosas parecidas com o lobo. Os cientistas dizem que os wargs são os descendentes de animais que eram armas biológicas militares criados para a supressão populacional. Os supersticiosos veem eles como as ferramentas de um deus irado. Só comem carne ou cadáveres.
LanguageData.Warg.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Warg.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Warg.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Warg_Leather.label: pele de warg
LanguageData.Warg_Meat.label: carne de warg
LanguageData.Warg_Corpse.label: cadáver de warg
LanguageData.Wolf_Timber.label: timber wolf
LanguageData.Wolf_Timber.description: A rugged predator long feared by many ancient Earth cultures. As pack hunters, wolves have complex social lives and are fiercely intelligent.
LanguageData.Wolf_Timber.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Wolf_Timber.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Wolf_Timber.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Wolf_Timber_Leather.label: timber wolf leather
LanguageData.Wolf_Timber_Meat.label: wolfmeat
LanguageData.Wolf_Timber_Corpse.label: timber wolf corpse
LanguageData.Wolf_Arctic.label: arctic wolf
LanguageData.Wolf_Arctic.description: An arctic variant of the old Earth wolf. As pack hunters, wolves have a complex social life and are fiercely intelligent.
LanguageData.Wolf_Arctic.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Wolf_Arctic.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Wolf_Arctic.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Wolf_Arctic_Leather.label: arctic wolf leather
LanguageData.Wolf_Arctic_Corpse.label: arctic wolf corpse
LanguageData.Fox_Fennec.label: fennec fox
LanguageData.Fox_Fennec.description: A small fox originally from the northern part of Earth's Africa continent. It hunts small creatures and has very large ears for cooling itself in the heat.
LanguageData.Fox_Fennec.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Fox_Fennec.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Fox_Fennec.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Fox_Fennec_Leather.label: fennec fox leather
LanguageData.Fox_Fennec_Meat.label: foxmeat
LanguageData.Fox_Fennec_Corpse.label: fennec fox corpse
LanguageData.Fox_Red.label: red fox
LanguageData.Fox_Red.description: A small solitary canine evolved for hunting small prey in temperate climates. Chicken farmers hate foxes because of their ability to destroy a whole coop in minutes.
LanguageData.Fox_Red.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Fox_Red.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Fox_Red.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Fox_Red_Leather.label: red fox leather
LanguageData.Fox_Red_Corpse.label: red fox corpse
LanguageData.Fox_Arctic.label: arctic fox
LanguageData.Fox_Arctic.description: A small predator adapted for cold climates. It usually hunts small game like mice and voles, sometimes burrowing through a meter of snow to reach its prey.
LanguageData.Fox_Arctic.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Fox_Arctic.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Fox_Arctic.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Fox_Arctic_Leather.label: arctic fox leather
LanguageData.Fox_Arctic_Corpse.label: arctic fox corpse
